description: Investigators scoured the Promenade des Anglais and mourners gathered at memorials a day after dozens of people were killed in Nice, France.
title: Aftermath of Terror on a Scenic Waterfront
title_page: Aftermath of Terror on a Scenic Waterfront - The New York Times
text: A young boy was comforted on Friday at a makeshift shrine by the Promenade des Anglais in Nice, France, the day after a truck rampage killed dozens of people and injured scores more.
